verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle,<s%> and <S%H4911>speak<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

And <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings,<s%> <S%H750>long-winged,<s%> <S%H83><s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5133>feathers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had divers <S%H7553>colors,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the highest <S%H6788>branch<s%> of the cedar: <S%H730><s%>

He cropped <S%H6998>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of his young <S%H3242>twigs,<s%> and <S%H935>carried<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>traffic;<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7402>merchants.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> also of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5414>planted<s%> it in a <S%H2233>fruitful<s%> <S%H7704>field;<s%> he <S%H3947>placed<s%> it <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> it as a willow <S%H6851>tree.<s%>

And it <S%H6779>grew,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5628>spreading<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6967>stature,<s%> whose <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> him, and the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> him: so it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and brought <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H905>branches,<s%> and shot <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H6288>sprigs.<s%>

There <S%H1961>was<s%> also <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5133>feathers:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> did <S%H3719>bend<s%> her <S%H8328>roots<s%> toward him, and shot <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> him, that he might <S%H8248>water<s%> it by the <S%H4480>furrows<s%> <S%H6170><s%> of her <S%H4302>plantation.<s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H8362>planted<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7704>soil<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> that it might bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6057>branches,<s%> and that it might <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> that it might <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H155>goodly<s%> <S%H1612>vine.<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> thou, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Shall it <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> pull <S%H5423>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof, and cut <S%H7082>off<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, that it <S%H3001>wither?<s%> it shall <S%H3001>wither<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2965>leaves<s%> of her <S%H6780>spring,<s%> even <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2220>power<s%> or <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to pluck it <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> by the <S%H4480>roots<s%> <S%H8328><s%> thereof.

Yea, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> being <S%H8362>planted,<s%> shall it <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall it <S%H3808>not<s%> utterly <S%H3001>wither,<s%> <S%H3001><s%> when the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> it? it shall <S%H3001>wither<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6170>furrows<s%> where it <S%H6780>grew.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> ye <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things mean? <S%H559>tell<s%> them, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof, and <S%H935>led<s%> them <S%H413>with<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon;<s%>

And hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> of the <S%H4410>king's<s%> <S%H4480>seed,<s%> <S%H2233><s%> and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, and hath <S%H935>taken<s%> an <S%H423>oath<s%> of him: he hath also <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H352>mighty<s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%>

That the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> might <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8217>base,<s%> that it might <S%H1115>not<s%> lift itself <S%H5375>up,<s%> but that by <S%H8104>keeping<s%> <S%H853><s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> it might <S%H5975>stand.<s%>

But he <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him in <S%H7971>sending<s%> his <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%> Shall he <S%H6743>prosper?<s%> shall he <S%H4422>escape<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> things? or shall he <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and be <S%H4422>delivered?<s%>

As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H4428>king<s%> dwelleth that made him <S%H4427>king,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H423>oath<s%> he <S%H959>despised,<s%> and <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> he <S%H6565>broke,<s%> even <S%H854>with<s%> him in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> with his <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> for him in the <S%H4421>war,<s%> by casting <S%H8210>up<s%> <S%H5550>mounts,<s%> and <S%H1129>building<s%> <S%H1785>forts,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> persons: <S%H5315><s%>

Seeing he <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H423>oath<s%> by <S%H6565>breaking<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> when, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> he had <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and hath <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4422>escape.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> As <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H518>surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> mine <S%H423>oath<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H959>despised,<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6565>broken,<s%> even it will I <S%H5414>recompense<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in my <S%H4686>snare,<s%> and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and will <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him <S%H8033>there<s%> for his <S%H4603>trespass<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4015>fugitives<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H102>bands<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and they that <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall be <S%H6566>scattered<s%> toward <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7307>winds:<s%> and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will also <S%H3947>take<s%> of the highest <S%H4480>branch<s%> <S%H6788><s%> of the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H730>cedar,<s%> and will <S%H5414>set<s%> it; I will crop <S%H6998>off<s%> from the <S%H4480>top<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of his young <S%H3127>twigs<s%> a tender <S%H7390>one,<s%> and will <S%H8362>plant<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and eminent: <S%H8524><s%>

In the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will I <S%H8362>plant<s%> it: and it shall bring <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H6057>boughs,<s%> and <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H117>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedar:<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> it shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>wing;<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H1808>branches<s%> thereof shall they <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have brought <S%H8213>down<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> have <S%H1361>exalted<s%> the <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> have dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and have made the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> to <S%H6524>flourish:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> it.
